name: Blake: The Visual Novel
description:
Blake: The Visual Novel is a graphic novel styled immersive thriller game, set in a tech-intelligent universe.

In the perpetually rainy city of New Stone, Blake, your average office worker, finds his world turned upside down when a series of incriminating events cause him to question what to do and who he should become.

Features:
- Immersive storyline enriched with twists and turns.
- Choice-driven consequences - Make allies or break bonds depending on who you want to trust.
- Small amount of gameplay involves optional puzzles.
- Graphic novel style artwork, animated characters and black & white stylised pivotal scenes.
- HD 1080P
